format: A data frame with 227 observations on the following 4 columns.

parameters.year: Year that time was first recorded

reference:
Record times for men's track events, from 1912 onwards.  The
series starts with times that were recognized as record times in 1912,
where available.
title: Progression of Record times for track races, 1912 - 2008
description:
Description
Progression in world record times for track and road races.
